title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: Silverback Stride MD - 29er
text:
Hi everyone



I'm selling my 2019 Silverback Stride MD mountain bike. It is a medium size with 29" wheels. It is a 21 speed (3 x 7).



It does have a few scratches from riding (no major damage or cracks), but overall it is really looked after well and in a great condition.



It is a perfect bike for someone who wants to get into mountain biking, but will also be using it on the road. I actually did the Cape Town Cycle Tour with it this year, and it felt great.



It was serviced at the beginning of the year and all cables and bearings were replaced. It also has a brand new set of Concept pedals.



The only reason I'm selling is because I upgraded to a new bike.



Send me a message for any more details.

title: 2017 Giant Anthem 2 Mountain Bike
text: 2017, Giant Anthem 2, a nimble ride that's a blast to weave through tricky lines or whip around turnsThe Anthem 2 is a fun and flickable 110mm, 27.5-inch offering from Giant. This nimble steed rips through corners and hunts down every site hit. It bunny hops and manuals at will and speedy acceleration adds to the fun. These antics combine with solid downhill and superior climbing performance to make for a solid, straightforward trail option. A few testers experience a suspiciously high number of pedal strikes aboard this bike. Other notable drawbacks are a less than ideal tire and rim width and an outdated cockpit setup with a long stem and narrower bars. Still, this bike is outfitted with an impressive value to performance ratio thanks to its spectacular build kit. The Giant sports Fox suspension, a Shimano SLX 1x11 drivetrain, Shimano Deore M615 brakes and a Giant Contact SL Switch dropper post. The Anthem is a fantastic option if you're more comfortable with smaller wheels and prefer a quick, responsive ride. This bike is well-equipped out of the box, is capable on a wide variety of terrain, and excels in tighter, more technical trails.

title: Pyga Slakline 29er Large
text:
Hey,

Price drop on my custom Pyga Slakline.

Built it new last year June and have done about 750km on it give or take and some of those kms were shuttle miles :)

I used all the Hope stuff I could get so it has Hope cranks, brakes, rotors, headset and wheel set. SLX 12 spd group set. Then to keep to SA products I went Lyne for the dropper, bars and stem. S.Manie saddle for some fun.
Running top Lyrik Ultimate up front and Super Deluxe Ultimate on the rear. 170/160mm travel.

Bike climbs like a beaut and obviously a beast on the downs.

Call or message me for more pics or info. Courier can be arranged. 0790465404
Cheers

text: Abandoned project.  Was going to add on to a ebike... Carbon Fibre shockFront wheelSpecifications:Application: Cross CountryWheel Size: 29"Suspension Type: airTravel: 100 mmSteerer Tube: 1 1/8 - 1.5" taperedAxle Type: Lefty 60Wheel Standard: Lefty 60Brake Mount: disc PM6 (direct mount 160 mm)Technical Information:Offset: 55 mmSteerer Tube Diameter (Stem): 28.6 mmSteerer Tube Diameter (Crown Race): 40 mmAxle to Crown: 510 mmOver Locknut Dimension: Lefty 60Stanchion Tube Diameter mm: 32 mmSteerer Tube Material: CarbonCrown Material: CarbonStanchion Tube Material: AluminiumLower Tube Material: CarbonAdjustment Options:Compression: yesRebound: yesSuspension Stiffness: air pressure adjustRemote: yesTravel Adjustment: noApproved For:Tyre Size (max.): 63 mm (width)Note: When the fork is fully compressed, the tyre clearance to the fork crown must be at least 3 mm.Rotor Size (max.): 180 mmWeight Limit: 138 kg (rider + gear)Note from the manufacturer:The FSA Orbit C-40-ACB No. 42 headset is required.Features:- Delta Cage: three rows of needle bearings for particularly low-friction operation- self-venting Chamber Damper with good temperature management- OppO spring system: air regulation without mechanical parts- StopLock quick-release brake caliper mount for easy and quick installation and removal of the brake caliper, e.g. when changing the wheel (5 mm hex tool required)- with protective carbon GuideGuard around the stanchion tubes, also serves as cable guide for the brake hose- very lightweight and stiff- precision steering- 55 mm OutFront offset optimised for flatter steering angles- SideCar air valve for inflation from the side
